name: HEY! Move yer Butt! Lazy Hero!
name_original: HEY! Move yer Butt! Lazy Hero!
description:
My Entry for the GMTK game jam 2020!

The demon Lord has come to invade the world! the hero is the only one who can stop him!

.. but he doesn't really want to...?

not to worry though! you as the helpful little fairy companion is here to help!

Move yer Butt! Lazy Hero! is a Point and click advanture game where the main character is "out of your control", instead you have to make sure he does the job done as the helpful fairy companion!

------------------------------------

extra credits:

music -  Three Red Hearts, Prepare to dev edition by Tallbeard studios

sfx -  Kenney's Game Assets by Kenney
